name: Jazz Night at the Blue Note
location: Blue Note Jazz Club, New York City, NY
short_description: An intimate evening of live jazz featuring world-class musicians.
long_description: Spend a cozy night at the iconic Blue Note Jazz Club, where some of the finest jazz musicians perform live. This exclusive event promises a night filled with soulful tunes, delicious food, and a vibrant atmosphere.
return_policy_specifics: Refundable until 24 hours before the event.
